src:
MU Disarankan Beli James Maddison dan Jack Grealish, Setuju?
01 Nov 2019, 09:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United ingin membeli pemain baru pada bursa transfer Januari. Untuk itu, mantan pemain Setan Merah Wes Brown menyarankan klub untuk merekrut James Maddison dan Jack Grealish.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer menginginkan Ed Woodward meningkatkan kekuatan skuatnya dengan setidaknya mendatangkan empat pemain baru dalam dua bursa transfer berikutnya. Mereka sebelumnya sudah menghabiskan 150 juta pounds pada musim panas lalu.
Pemain baru seperti Harry Maguire, Aaron Wan-Bissaka dan Daniel James mampu tampil mengesankan untuk Setan Merah. Namun, pasukan Solskjaer masih mengalami kesulitan pada awal musim ini.
United berhasil menahan imbang pimpinan klasemen Premier League Liverpool dan mengalahkan Chelsea di Carabao Cup belum lama ini. Namun, mereka berada di urutan ketujuh pada klasemen menjelang pertandingan akhir pekan ini.
text:
MU Recommended to Buy James Maddison and Jack Grealish, Agree?
Nov 1, 2019, 09:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United wants to buy new players in the January transfer window. For this reason, former Red Devils player Wes Brown advised the club to recruit James Maddison and Jack Grealish.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer wants Ed Woodward to increase the strength of his squad by bringing in at least four new players in the next two transfer markets. They previously spent 150 million pounds last summer.
New players like Harry Maguire, Aaron Wan-Bissaka and Daniel James were able to impress for the Red Devils. However, Solskjaer's troops are still experiencing difficulties at the start of this season.
United managed to draw against Premier League leaders Liverpool and beat Chelsea in the Carabao Cup recently. However, they are seventh in the table ahead of this weekend's match.
